snippet.title: Company of Heroes 2: Debut Gameplay Trailer (Official HD)
snippet.description:
Join us for our first all-gameplay trailer for Company of Heroes 2!  Relic Entertainment and THQ take you to the Eastern Front to experience the brutal cold of war.  With ColdTech presenting winter warfare in unprecedented fidelity, the RTS genre will never be the same again.

It's Your Command, Their Survival in Company of Heroes 2!

Pre-order today!
Steam: http://is.gd/HIgnoF
ShopTHQ: http://is.gd/UeIELd
Origin: http://is.gd/5m7M6r

Like us on Facebook for news and exclusive giveaways!
http://www.facebook.com/companyofheroes
